title: EastEnders spoilers: Gray takes cruel action against Chantelle tonight
text:
If there’s one thing we know about Gray Atkins (Toby-Alexander Smith) in EastEnders, it’s that he certainly doesn’t like losing control of a situation — something which wife Chantelle (Jessica Plummer) has learned the hard way on plenty of occasions in the past. While he’s been forced to keep his anger in check due to his wife’s pregnancy, he finds another way to unfairly punish her tonight, when he’s left displeased with her actions.

Tonight, Denise (Diane Parish) asks Chantelle to cover a shift at the salon — and she’s overjoyed at the prospect of returning to work. However, while she relishes the opportunity, she withholds this information from Gray.

Meanwhile, a girl steals from Whitney’s (Shona McGarty) stall, and — having seen the commotion unfold — Gray attempts to help. He sets off to apprehend the thief, and — as a result — he ends up running by the salon, where he sees Chantelle hard at work.

Later, Chantelle pops into The Queen Vic, but she’s alarmed to see everyone there. However, the reason soon becomes apparent, as Gray wastes little time in announces their news to them all.

Gray knows that Chantelle wanted her pregnancy to be kept between them for now, so his decision to tell everyone is undoubtedly linked to the fact that she didn’t tell him about returning to work.

How will Chantelle react when her news becomes public?

EastEnders continues on Monday 21st October at 8pm on BBC One.

description: Gray is left displeased with Chantelle's actions and thus he decides to unfairly punish his wife once more.
